original_title: Depeche Mode: 1980–81 “Do We Really Have to Give Up Our Day Jobs?”
overview: "Do We Really Have to Give Up Our Day Jobs?" -  A documentary about the making of the album Speak & Spell,  featuring interviews with the group including former band member Vince Clarke and other relevant personnel such as Daniel Miller. It features various vintage footage, such as appearances on Top of the Pops and BBC Speak & Spell Tour recordings.
tagline: Do We Really Have to Give Up Our Day Jobs?
title: Depeche Mode: 1980–81 “Do We Really Have to Give Up Our Day Jobs?”
